Posts.Content: Hi Debbie, I'm also a journalist at Columbia. Not a previvor, but trying to figure out whether or not to get the test. My mother has BRCA 2.
Posts.Title: Journalist doing PGD-looking for others like me

Posts.Content: My mom was diagnosed at 31, now she's in her late fifties and doing fine. I'm trying to decide whether I'm ready for genetic testing.
Posts.Title: BREAST CANCER IN UNDER 35's......
